Tucson Prime was listening to Rodimus.  More and more he felt most confiden=
t in Rodimus's abilities to return to his leadership duties.  He had held b=
ack hoping Rodimus would make the right decision, to his assurance he had. =
 He nodds in agreement of getting out of there, and also respects Perceptor=
's wish to have his feedom of choice.  And then he gets the all clear from =
Dark Hawk to help him.  Tucson Prime kneels down and gently picks him up, a=
nd carefully, without hurting him, places the stasis cuffs on Darkhawk. 

"=
 All right, Dark Hawk is sedated and securred.  The way you're speaking of =
Perceptor better be a safe route. I don't wish to endanger the lives of any=
one, especially Darkhawk who is seriously injured.  If you deviate from thi=
s route you speak of, you'll have me to answer to.  And believe me, you do =
not want to catch me in a bad mood."

Night Shift nodds.

"That's right Mr.=
 Shadey, he don't take no nonsense from anyone.  Now, let's make it outa he=
re in one piece while we still can".

Tucson directs an ear toward Rodimus.=


" Good work Rodimus.  Your decisions would have also been mine.  I now be=
lieve that soon enough you will be able to assume leadership duties."

Outs=
ide, with Straight Shot's coming online once more, Rat Trap senses another =
Autobot signature appearing on his list of active Maximals and Autobots.  H=
e looks to Legacy.

" Legacy, correct me if I'm wrong but my energy signatu=
re reading's just picked up the pressense of another Autobot.  Hmm, wonder =
who it is..."

He pulls of a profiler on his gauntlett device, and drums up=
 Straight Shot.

"Ooooh Primus, things are gonna get interestn' at the Ark.=
  It's another femme bot, and this one's got some spunk.. And a fist full o=
f arrows...  Umm, wouldn't wanna insult her that's for sure..."

At the Ark=
..  

Straight Shot manages to find a supply of energon and gets herself en=
ough to get back on her feet.  She sips on it slowly as she now gains more =
strength throughout her body.  She walks over to Elita.  It had been a long=
 time since she had seen her last.  She was elated to see how much she had =
grown and shows her elation through a smile.

" Elita, it's been a long tim=
e, I missed you."

She then looks to Lord Elder.  She had met him at one ti=
me, but did not get the chance to really know him.

"Lord Elder, Right?  It=
's been a long time, and I think we were introduced a while ago, but, maybe=
 ya don't remember who I am.  If not, I'm Straight Shot, Tucson's half sist=
er and his all time favorite weapon of choice.  But we're not cheating, he =
does all the aiming and firing when he uses me.  Oh, yeah, ya might not kno=
w that part. My alt modes are Cross Bow and regular bow.  So, um, speakn' o=
f my half brother..  He is okay right?"
